author: potuz
content: Nodes keep the best possible aggregates they can using different algorithms. Prysm uses max coverage that you can read here: https://ethresear.ch/t/attestation-aggregation-heuristics/7265, you can read about lighthouse's here: https://lighthouse-blog.sigmaprime.io/optimising-attestation-packing.html

author: potuz
content: No, nodes keep several aggregations, a block can pack up to 128 different aggregates
